newsitem.title: USA: Krantor one-for-25 reverse split approved.
newsitem.headline: Krantor one-for-25 reverse split approved.

text.p: Krantor Corp said Thursday its shareholders had approved a one-for-25 reverse stock split, bringing the total number of shares outstanding to 1.1 million.
The company said its stock will trade under the symbol "KRAND" on the Nasdaq Stock Market for 20 days before reverting to "KRAN," its normal symbol.

Krantor is engaged in the food brokerage business, specializing in the distribution of frozen seafood and brand name grocery products to major wholesalers and retailers in the United States and the Caribbean.
